title: Italian Fresh Herb Vinaigrette Recipe
full_text:
Italian Fresh Herb Vinaigrette Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
15 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
12 servings
Makes
1 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
loosely packed fresh flat leaf parsley
, roughly chopped (about
1
small
bunch
)
10
large
fresh basil leaves
1/4
teaspoon
dried oregano
2
medium
cloves garlic
, roughly chopped (about
2
teaspoons
)
1/4
cup
high quality
red wine vinegar
1 1/2
teaspoons
honey
3/4
cup
extra-virgin olive oil
Kosher salt
and freshly ground black pepper
Directions
Combine parsley, basil, oregano, garlic, vinegar, and honey in the bowl of a food processor and process until a paste forms. With the machine running, drizzle in the olive oil to form an emulsion. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Vinaigrette is best used immediately, but can be stored in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
